LanguageData.AnomaliesExpected.BloodLake.UndergroundN: A group of fleshbeasts is emerging from Underground Fleshmass Nest nearby
LanguageData.AnomaliesExpected.BloodLake.ReactorMeltd: The facility's reactor exploded, severing the connection with other Blood Lake
LanguageData.AnomaliesExpected.BloodLake.ViewSubMap.D: View the connected map on the other side
The open space lies before us, yet it's swarming with different kinds of fleshbeasts. We must brace ourselves for a ferocious attacks from the surrounding fleshmass network.\n\nIf we're not ready to confront this threat, we should fall back to our colony and arm ourselves.
